name: Super Doom TV
summary: Doomguy is off to fight in the biggest event in galactic history, Super Doom TV! Every eyeball on every creature on every planet will be tuned to broadcast-compliant screens everywhere to see him plow through 25 sectors of high definition carnage. Super Doom TV is a 25 map megawad where each map was given an arena title from the SNES classic Super Smash T.V. as a prompt for mappers to work from. ﻿
